column4: ive got this AMD-Athlon64-nvidia chipset based system to install on but i seem to recall seeing something about there being some annoyances with the AMD64 architecture. Is that correct? where can I find out more?
can be a bitch to get things working right... but i managed... it took all weekend though.
knoppix is better for stuff like that... it boots from cd, and has lots of tools for you...
